formula: Maple says that cyclotomic(1573,x) is a polynomial of 120th order in the variable x^11, so it is c = 1 - x^11 - x^132 + x^264 + ... + x^1320, or with y = x^11 we can write c = 1 - y + y^11 - y^12 + y^13 - y^14 ... + y^120. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2008
maple: with(numtheory,cyclotomic); c := n->series(1/cyclotomic(n, x), x,80); c(1573);
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Incorrect formula deleted by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 20 2008
